info.name: Delta Share - Workflow API
info.description: API collection for share pack workflow management and provisioning (feature-flagged: enable_workflow=true)

request.description:
Upload a YAML share pack configuration file for validation and provisioning.

Accepts: .yaml, .yml files
Includes smart strategy auto-detection (NEW vs UPDATE).

Response 202: Message, SharePackId, SharePackName, Status (IN_PROGRESS), ValidationErrors, ValidationWarnings
Response 400: Invalid file format or validation errors

Upload an Excel share pack configuration file for validation and provisioning.

Accepts: .xlsx, .xls files
Includes smart strategy auto-detection (NEW vs UPDATE).

Response 202: Message, SharePackId, SharePackName, Status (IN_PROGRESS), ValidationErrors, ValidationWarnings
Response 400: Invalid file format or validation errors

Get current status of a share pack by ID.

Response 200: SharePackId, SharePackName, Status (IN_PROGRESS/COMPLETED/FAILED), Strategy, ProvisioningStatus, ErrorMessage, RequestedBy, CreatedAt, LastUpdated
Response 404: Share pack not found

Check workflow system health. Verifies database connection, queue connection, and database schema (16 expected tables).

Response 200: Message, DatabaseConnected, QueueConnected, TablesCount
Response 503: Unhealthy - database or queue connection failed
